title: Bulk Update Product Tags for SEO
description: An SEO specialist wants to add a new tag (e.g., 'eco-friendly') to a list of products to improve their search filterability.

tasks.description: Receive a list of SKUs and the tag to be added ('eco-friendly').
For each SKU in the list, retrieve its current tags.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the current list of tags for each product.

tasks.description: Append the new tag to the existing tags for each product and save the changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully performs the bulk update without removing existing tags.
